title: Microwave and Radar Engineering with Lab Manual (gnv64)
description: Microwave and Radar Engineering with Lab Manual by Vinith Chauhan University Science Press | August 2017 | ISBN 978-93-83828-65-4 | PDF | 638 Pages | 72.1 mb https://www.amazon.in/Microwave-Radar-Engineering-Lab-Manual-ebook/dp/B0756997KR http://www.laxmipublications.com/servlet/lpgetbiblio?bno=B000088&pageName=Keywords The book Microwave and Radar Engineering has been written for the B.Tech students of Uttar Pradesh Technical University, Lucknow, Maharshi Dayanand University, Rohtak and other Indian Universities. This book consists of nine chapters. Each chapter has been arranged with a unique style in order to deal with fundamentals of the subject keeping in mind the necessities of the students. The emphasis has been laid on concepts as well as on mathematical derivations in order to help the students to understand the theoretical and practical aspects of Microwave and Radar Engineering. About the Author Vinith Chauhan is presently working as an Assistant Professor and Head, Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering at St. Margaret Engineering College, Neemrana, Alwar , Rajasthan. He obtained his M. Tech. degree in Digital Communications from Rajasthan Technical University, Kota and MBA in Operations Research from Indira Gandhi National Open University, New Delhi. He has 12 years of teaching experience in technical institutes. Presently he is pursuing Ph.D. from National Institute of Technology, Hamirpur. His areas of interest include Microwave Engineering, Wireless Sensor Networks, and Digital Signal Processing CONTENTS Preface .... (xiii) Acknowledgement .... (xiv) Syllabus ....
